title: Plead The Fifth: Is Kristin Holding Onto A Secret From Her Past Relationships?
description:
It’s been YEARS since we’ve done Plead The Fifth. We took a page out of “Real Housewives” creator Andy Cohen’s book from his late-night talk show, “Watch What Happens Live.”
When he has a celebrity on, he gives them THREE questions, and they’re only allowed to skip ONE – a.k.a. “Pleading the Fifth.”
Today, Kristin is in the hot seat! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
